Texts.Chs: 当你解锁更多的配方，你会发现你的潜力将会成倍增加。
Texts.Eng: As you unlock more blueprints, you will find your potential for death, destruction and protection will increase exponentially.

Texts.Chs: 我相信你不需要别人告诉你^orange;军械库^reset;是拿来做什么的。用它，你可以制造出许多种类的盔甲和武器。首先，让我们试试制作一把^orange;激光手枪^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: I'm sure you don't need to be told what your ^orange;Armory^reset; does!  The armor and weapons you can create here are varied. Let's test it out by building a ^orange;Laser Pistol^reset;.
